_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Bonjour Tremblant!

Conditions on the mountain are looking fantastic! Whether you're a seasoned skier or visiting for the first time this season, today is a wonderful opportunity to get out and enjoy the snow.

For those who love alpine touring and snowshoeing, we’re happy to offer access to 8 beautiful open sections today.

Please exercise caution, as active snowmaking operations may result in reduced visibility in certain areas. 

We can’t wait to welcome you on the mountain! 

Mountain safety tip of the week: At intersections, give way to those higher up! Give way to those higher up when entering a trail and at intersections. 

Snow fall is recorded daily at 5 a.m from mid-mountain at North Side (550 m / 1,800 ft). This data, based on 24 hours, provides a picture of on-mountain conditions. Actual accumulation may differ from the official report. Be aware of changing conditions. Lifts and trails exist in a mountain environment and may close due to weather, usage and/or special maintenance.
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReport:
Conditions on the mountain are looking fantastic! Whether you're a seasoned skier or visiting for the first time this season, today is a wonderful opportunity to get out and enjoy the snow.
Please exercise caution, as active snowmaking operations may result in reduced visibility in certain areas.  Enjoy the day safely!
_inspectorSnowReport.SafetyReportFrench: Les conditions en montagne sont fantastiques! Que vous soyez un skieur expérimenté ou que vous veniez pour la première fois cette saison, c'est aujourd'hui une merveilleuse occasion de sortir et de profiter de la neige. Veuillez également faire preuve de prudence : des opérations d’enneigement sont en cours, ce qui peut occasionner une visibilité réduite par endroits. Profitez de la journée en toute sécurité!
